options.name: Reaction : Interpose
options.description: In response to an Enemy Creature Moving within 1 Unit of an Ally, you can move up to 4 Units towards that ally. If you end up within 1 Unit of both the ally and enemy, you can make an Attack Action against that target.

options.name: Reaction : Know Thine Enemy
options.description: When a Creature Attacks you with a Melee Attack, you can use your Academics Skill in place of a Dodge Check

options.name: Well Learned
options.description: Become Good at one Knowledge Skill

options.name: Sentinel Stance
options.description: Gain the Sentinel Stance and +1 Academics.

options.name: Free Action : Feint
options.description: You make a quick Attack with a Light 2-Handed Weapon meant to distract, only dealing Primary Damage equal to the Bonus Damage Modifier and causing your Target to have a 1d4 Penalty to their next Defense Check before the start of your next turn. If the next Attack is a True Hit, the Damage is increased by 1d10.
